title: Don't Call Me Greta
description: Don’t Call Me Greta is a poignant story filled with intrigue, adventure and the struggle of family loyalties.Piper Winslow’s life is destroyed when her mother is arrested for kidnapping her as an infant. With her mom in jail and her real family about to reclaim her as Greta—her birth name—what can she do? Run, of course.Escaping close calls and dominating headlines while eluding authorities, Piper and an unlikely passenger are on a harrowing adventure.Piper’s birth parents are determined. She is discovered and returned to her real family… but not everyone is happy to see her.As Piper struggles to cope in her new life, she hits one obstacle after another. This family that appears so perfect on the outside, harbors secrets, and nothing is as it seems...Will she ever be fully accepted?Will she ever fit in?Will they ever stop calling her Greta?
author: Angie Stanton
